Question: During his Dinkytown days, Zimmerman began introducing himself as "this person".
Hints: In June 1986, this person married his longtime backup singer Carolyn Dennis (often professionally known as Carol Dennis).
Concerts in Tokyo in February and March were recorded and released as the live double album, this person At Budokan.
While in London, this person performed at several London folk clubs, including The Troubadour, Les Cousins, and Bunjies.
